00038 /* Define the number of priority groups for the render system's render targets. */
00039 #ifndef OGRE_NUM_RENDERTARGET_GROUPS
00040     #define OGRE_NUM_RENDERTARGET_GROUPS 10
00041     #define OGRE_DEFAULT_RT_GROUP 4
00042     #define OGRE_REND_TO_TEX_RT_GROUP 2
00043 #endif
